Verses: 1 aadhaamin Vamsavaralaaru: Dhevan Manushanai Sirushtiththa Naalile Avanai Dhevasaayalaaga Undaakkinaar.
2 avargalai Aanum Pennumaaga Sirushtiththu, Avargalai Aaseervadhiththu, Avargalai Sirushtiththa Naalile Avargalukku Manushar Endru Perittaar.
3 aadhaam Nootru Muppadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Than Saayalaagath Than Roobaththinpadiye Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukku Seth Endru Perittaan.
4 aadhaam Seththaip Petrapin, Ennooru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
5 aadhaam Uyirodirundha Naalellaam Tholaayiraththu Muppadhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
6 seth Nootraindhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Enosaip Petraan.
7 seth Enosaip Petrapin, Ennootrezhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
8 seththudaiya Naalellaam Tholaayiraththup Pannirandu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
9 enos Thonnooru Vayadhaanapodhu, Kenaanaip Petraan.
10 enos Kenaanaip Petrapin, Ennootrup Padhinaindhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
11 enosudaiya Naalellaam Tholaayiraththu Aindhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
12 kenaan Ezhubadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Makalaaleyelaip Petraan.
13 kenaan Makalaaleyelaip Petrapin, Ennootru Naarpadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
14 kenaanudaiya Naalellaam Tholaayiraththup Paththu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
15 makalaaleyel Arubaththaindhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Yaaredhaip Petraan.
16 makalaaleyel Yaaredhaip Petrapin, Ennootru Muppadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
17 makalaaleyeludaiya Naalellaam Ennootruth Thonnootru Aindhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
18 yaaredh Nootru Arubaththirandu Vayadhaanapodhu, Enokkaip Petraan.
19 yaaredh Enokkaip Petrapin, Ennooru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
20 yaaredhudaiya Naalellaam Tholaayiraththu Arubaththirandu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
21 enokku Arubaththaindhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Meththoosalaavaip Petraan.
22 enokku Meththoosalaavaip Petrapin, Munnooru Varusham Dhevanode Sanjariththukkondirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
23 enokkudaiya Naalellaam Munnootru Arubaththaindhu Varusham.
24 enokku Dhevanode Sanjariththukkondirukkaiyil, Kaanappadaamarponaan; Dhevan Avanai Eduththukkondaar.
25 meththoosalaa Nootrenbaththezhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Laamekkaip Petraan.
26 meththoosalaa Laamekkaip Petrapin, Ezhunootru Enbaththirandu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
27 meththoosalaavudaiya Naalellaam Tholaayiraththu Arubaththonbadhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
28 laamekku Nootrenbaththirandu Vayadhaanapodhu, Oru Kumaaranaip Petru,
29 karththar Sabiththa Boomiyile Namakku Undaana Velaiyilum, Nammudaiya Kaigalin Prayaasaththilum, Ivan Nammaith Thetruvaan Endru Solli, Avanukku Novaa Endru Perittaan.
30 laamekku Novaavaip Petrapin, Ainnootruth Thonnootru Aindhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
31 laamekkudaiya Naalellaam Ezhunootru Ezhupaththezhu Varusham; Avan Mariththaan.
32 novaa Ainnooru Vayadhaanapodhu, Sem Kaam Yaappedh Enbavargalaip Petraan.
